comment: Very dangerous. Smells like butterscotch. Taste smooth

Too much maple syrup flavor taste
7/6/17... Charleston Pub during tasting tour
This is unreal. Its exactly what you expect and delivers. Must buy!

This is a great after dinner bourbon.  Not sure why the ratings are so low on this, yes it doesn’t taste like normal straight bourbon, but the flavors are fantastically smooth with pecan sweet flavor.  pour it over the rocks and enjoy!

The moment you open this bottle your nose is hit with the delicious smell of Butter Pecan Ice Cream. Very sweet taste, Pecans very present. Makes a great dessert sipper but a great mixer. Mixes excellent with Buffalo Trace Bourbon Cream.
Too sweet. Tastes like maple cereal.

Drinking a 375ml. If you judge this as a flavored whisky it’s a 5 star. If you’re comparing it to your favorite scotch, it’s like comparing chocolate and steak.  Don’t. 

Reminds me of sipping Crown Vanilla
Sweet from the maple at first, but the finish is warm, nutty, and smooth! I used to hate Bourbon, and this really opened up a new world of brown spirits for me!

This flavored bourbon is one of the very best flavored whiskeys on the market today. It makes a near-perfect pairing with vanilla ice cream as a dessert. To me, this drink mixes the best characteristics of a soft bourbon and an amaretto. It has a soft delicate pecan/nutty flavor that stays in your mouth between each sip. If you like nutty liqueurs and bourbon this will most likely be a home run for you.
Sweet, would be great with ice cream
Tasty after dinner bourbon. On the sweeter side with the maple but nice overall sipping straight up and good flavor profile
Good flavor but a bit too sweet
